basic_multi_buffer::basic_multi_buffer (9 of 10 overloads)

Copy Constructor.

Synopsis 
template<
    class OtherAlloc>
basic_multi_buffer(
    basic_multi_buffer< OtherAlloc > const& other);
Description

This container is constructed with the contents of other using copy semantics. The maximum size will be the same as the copied object.

Parameters

Name

Description

other

The object to copy from.

Exceptions

Type

Thrown On

std::length_error

if other.size() exceeds the maximum allocation size of the allocator.
